summary: Plan an app/project for a fitness cafe brand called "Gym & Tonic" that supports multiple workout types (weight training, calisthenics, rowing/cardio) with a holistic fitness focus and membership-inclusive full-time access to an in-house cafe called "Tonic."
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal logo mark with text “Gym & Tonic” in a bold, modern style (gym-tonic-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner illustration/photo-collage style showing a gym+cafe vibe with weights/calisthenics/rowing hints (gym-tonic-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Small set of 4 monochrome icons: dumbbell, pull-up bar/rings, rowing machine, coffee cup (gym-tonic-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a small marketing website for the brand “Gym & Tonic” that clearly presents: (1) the gym concept, (2) the supported workout styles (weight training, calisthenics, rowing/cardio), (3) the holistic fitness outlook, and (4) the membership-inclusive full-time cafe access to the in-house cafe called “Tonic”. All user-facing text must be in English.

Implement Internet Identity sign-in and an Account area that shows the signed-in user’s membership status and whether they have “Tonic” cafe access included. If the user is not signed in, the Account area must prompt them to sign in.

Add a simple “Tonic Access Pass” view for signed-in members that can be used as a digital proof-of-access screen (showing the cafe name “Tonic”, the user identifier, membership state, and an “Access: Granted/Not granted” indicator).

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a modern fitness cafe brand (avoid blue/purple as primary colors). Define consistent typography, spacing, and UI patterns across all pages/sections.
Add the generated static image assets to the frontend and use them in the marketing site (hero/branding) without routing images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Define core concept and offerings for Gym & Tonic fitness cafe (workout types: weights, calisthenics, cardio/rowing; holistic fitness positioning).
Support membership-inclusive full-time access to the cafe area "Tonic" (membership policy/entitlements).

Create backend data models and APIs to store and retrieve a user’s membership status and Tonic cafe access entitlement keyed by the user’s Internet Identity principal. Include an admin-only method (restricted to a configured admin principal list) to set/update a user’s membership and Tonic access.
